what: Retrieve and Process Congressional Record Speeches — get_congressional_records
title: Retrieve and Process Congressional Record Speeches — get_congressional_records
text: Queries Congressional Record collection given session date range, retrieves speech text associated metadata granules, processes information structured tibble. Supports limiting number speeches collected.

title: Retrieve and Process Congressional Record Speeches — get_congressional_records
code: get_congressional_records(   API_KEY,   max_results = NULL,   date_from = NULL,   date_to = NULL,   congress_session = 117 )

title: Retrieve and Process Congressional Record Speeches — get_congressional_records
text: API_KEY Character string. API key accessing govinfo API. max_results Integer (optional). Maximum number speeches retrieve. `NULL`, retrieves available speeches. date_from Character string (optional). Start date (YYYY-MM-DD) filtering records. `NULL`, determined session. date_to Character string (optional). End date (YYYY-MM-DD) filtering records. `NULL`, determined session. congress_session Integer. Congressional session number (default 117).

title: Retrieve and Process Congressional Record Speeches — get_congressional_records
text: tibble row corresponds extracted speech, including columns URL, date, title, speaker, speech text.
